title: DataStax's Apache Cassandra & DSE C# Hour - Ep 1
description:
In this show we explore the options, paths, and ways to get development done with C#, .NET Core, Apache Cassandra, and DataStax Enterprise. Join for explorations into the code with Adron!

In this first episode I got into various different topics. The first was installing Mono, which has issues, then installing dotnet core which also had some minor issues, but in the end I got them installed. I also searched and found a library for random, yet realistic, data generation for .NET called Bogus. Another topic was IDE differences with the CLI, using Jetbrains Rider to create a console application vs. the dotnet CLI itself.

I'll be covering this and much more on subsequent episodes, in addition to web development, and related all around connecting to and harnessing the power of DataStax Enterprise and Apache Cassandra.

 -- Watch live at https://www.twitch.tv/datastaxadevs
